entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce iteration over regmaskTP in relevant methods #113670
  • EnvelopedCms.ContentEncryptionAlgorithm.Parameters is empty after call to Decode on Windows #113668
  • How do I debug dotnet code in a hostfxr C++ app? (Not Visual Studio mixed mode) #113665
  • NativeAOT runtime crash with source-generated serialization ('Failed to create generic virtual method implementation') #113664
  • Faulty codegen SkipLocalsInit Nullable<T> default value arm64 #113658
    10.0.0
  • MONO_WASM: jit_call code generation failed in Blazor WASM project #113657
    9.0.x
  • Linux x64 machine running out of space #113652
  • Speed improvements for Maths.Abs() on integers #113651
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembers` annotations do not seem to be working on type delcarations. #113650
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding IMemoryOwner<T>.Slice and IMemoryOwner<T>.AsReadOnly #113644
  • [S.T.J] JsonProperty unused private field #113643
    Future
  • [mono-runtime] "unknown option: -verbose" on mono based archs while running xunit console runner validating System.IO.Tests #113642
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance X509Store Import to Support Secure Private Key Storage (Linux & Cross-Platform) #113641
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/6/2025 2:14:44 PM +00:00 #113655
    10.0.0
  • [Android AOT] Precompiling failing in .NET 9 #113672

Closed

  • `TypeBuilder.CreateType()` gets stuck in infinite loop when creating a type that has itsself as parent #112072
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on [FromKeyedServices]? #113585
  • c# program segfaults when ran under callgrind #113043
  • Some runtime symbol packages are missing DotNetReleaseShipping=true #112023
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #113052
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.XmlDsigExcC14NTransformTest.ExcC14NSpecExample5 #113049
    10.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Support containment for instructions `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #81522
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Enable contained form for shlx, sarx, shrx and on x86 #67314
    Future
  • Incorrect marshalling of Bool return types in new exception handling #113574
    10.0.0
  • build coreclr parts required for the interpreter #113065
  • HttpClient inconsistant behaviour #113605
    10.0.0
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] No nightly stress runs for old versions #113372
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.BasicTest_WithReadsCompletedCheck #113635
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.CloseAsync_ByServer_AcceptThrows #113636
  • [HttpStress] Linux image is running out of disk space #111660
    10.0.0
  • dotnet OpenSSL double free with Ubuntu 24.04 #109689
    10.0.0
  • JIT: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_33529 fails under OSR stress #111625
    10.0.0
  • [browser] streaming HTTP HEAD fails in Firefox with TypeError: e.body is null #111992
    8.0.x
  • Native AOT ARM32 lanes failing after docker update #113609
    10.0.0
  • Vector128 and Vector256 Shuffle produces unexpected asm #113582
  • WCF on Linux - Kerberos Authentication with UpnEndpointIdentity seems to be sending the wrong name-type to the KDC. #31040
  • Marshal.SizeOf of bool and char report wrong value #113599
  • SizeConverter is trying to convert even before verifying the value could be converted #92424
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert JitHelper `JIT_StrCns` to QCall #113674
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add SpanSplitEnumerator.Source #113673
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • WIP: this is a test #113671
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] [HttpStress] Re-enable ASAN for msquic #113669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Target NetFrameworkCurrent in tests and remove old mentions #113667
    needs-area-label
  • Support HasThis calling convention in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #113666
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • [workloads] Bump the downlevels in main to 9.0.3/8.0.14 #113663
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Pin SHAs for container images""" #113659
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113649
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete vestiges of unused assembly formats #113646
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono]: Additional support for signal async safe stack-walks. #113645
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Scaffold SLH-DSA based on ML-DSA #113634
    area-System.Security
  • Delete useless tests #113633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/10.0-preview3] Bump downlevels for p3 #113662
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Delete vestiges of universal shared code support #113640
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change superpmi-replay pipeline from PR triggered to scheduled #113661
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change SuperPMI replay pipeline partitions #113660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ThisptrRetbufPrecode to set of precodes handled by StubPrecode path #112548
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Additional Tar tests for filled in size when data is empty #107815
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/10.0-preview3] JIT: Don't use checked bounds in assertprop #113656
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX (#113032) #113489
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • Update area owners for hosting #112966
    area-Meta
  • [8.0] Update Ubuntu pipelines from 18.04 to 22.04 #113441
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Move macro definition to give better out-of-the-box VSCode experience on Windows #113557
    area-VM-coreclr, dev-innerloop
  • JIT: Enable containment for BMI2 shift and rotate instructions #111778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use checked bounds in assertprop #113638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update unmanaged signatures to match managed QCall signatures. #113578
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Don't repeat 'QueryInterface' calls for 'IReferenceTracker' when possible #113632
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [HttpStress] Fix Linux HttpStress build #113617
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #113124
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix double dispose of GCHandle in BrowserWebSocket #113541
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Disable recursive tailcall to loop opt in OSR methods #113625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] disable HttpStreamingDisabledBy_WasmEnableStreamingResponse_InProject #113639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [wasm] initial build of coreclr.runtime #113429
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bump main to preview4 #113631
    area-Infrastructure
  • skip MonoLLVMSDKDebugSuffix for local build #113536
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Fix misaligned reads in NativeAOT code manager #113637
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Treat Char/Bool as requiring marshalling #113602
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable LongProcessNamesAreSupported on OSX #113600
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Do not throw for `Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(delegate*<void>))` #113603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Handle containment for shift instructions with EVEX encoding #111644
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor geometric type converters for improved parsing #111349
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution

Updated

  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] managed Diagnostics.Metrics and Diagnostics.Tracing single-threaded #113524
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers Part 1 #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ms:format-date and ms:format-time test cases #113507
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix constrained call corner cases #111178
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Modernize `CookieContainer` domain-matching #112604
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Consume libraries that we vendor fully by building separately and using a custom prefix path #113176
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [cDAC] Statically link in native dependencies #113627
    area-Meta
  • Remove `CryptoConfigForwarder` et al. #112306
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Stub Precode variant for DynamicHelpers #113402
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Compress SafeSocketHandle.Unix booleans #112417
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix building the sanitizer instrumentation and hooking it into the hosts #112378
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113503
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 8.0.16
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113418
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • [release/9.0-staging] Do not substitute return values of constrained calls #113462
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • [9.0] Update openssl dependency for openSUSE #113548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 9.0.5
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • Fix null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #113606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use await using in HttpContentJsonExtensions #113359
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Reenable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds test #113604
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Card bundles for GC heap for arm32 implemented. #113260
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • SafeFileHandle.ThreadPoolValueTaskSource made ligher by one field #113435
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Initial CoreClr Android logcat log integration. #113416
    area-VM-coreclr
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove CopyFile, GetTempFileName from PAL #113490
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI tests #113571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Changes from #113440 with diffs #113559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve zero-sized methods check and missing ret at exit #112082
    area-Tools-ILVerification, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
